EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Dallas Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Dallas at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Tuesday, July 25, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Dallas Fort Work 211 N Ervay St, #900, Dallas, TX 75201 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+North+Ervay,+211+N+Ervay+St,+Dallas,+TX+75201/@32.7821534,-96.7998016,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864e99220027e345:0x5821f5dfa4274d24!8m2!3d32.7821534!4d-96.7976129?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/dallas?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
